Trustee_1_pre_7.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_7.content: The trustee exhibited commendable integrity, adhering to the proposed allocation plan and distributing more resources than promised while prioritizing my interests. This behavior has established trust and reflects a dedication to fairness and transparency, enhancing the overall investment experience.

Trustee_1_pre_29.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_29.content: Hiroshi Tanaka demonstrated exceptional integrity throughout the investment process, strictly following the proposed allocation plan and distributing more resources than initially promised. This behavior not only showcased his commitment to fairness and transparency but also strengthened the trust in our partnership. His reputation is well-deserved, reflecting a consistent dedication to both ethical practices and effective performance.
